name: Shinobi Path
description:
This is a stealth topdown game, you are a shinobi (ninja) with various assassination skills and stealth tactics. Take down your enemies without being seen, drag their cold dead body inside bushes to hide them from the other ninjas, manage your inventory and develop your unique play style! 

< ^ > to move

E open inventory

C attack

X throw equipped weapon (in this version you can throw rocks)

SPACE sprint (consume stamina)

SHIFT crouch walk

Z pickup nearby objects (little rocks around the map)

Z drag dead body (hide bodies in bushes)

This DEMO works best with a 16:9 monitor (select resolution 1920x1080 or 1280x720) , otherwise you may encounter some visual bugs.

INSTAGRAM: @daniele_anglani

If you need help contact me on instagram or via email danyangla@hotmail.it

Thank you for your time.
